### [Reduction Functions](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionfunction/init(_:)#Reduction-Functions)

[`var rawValue: UInt32`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionfunction/rawvalue)[`init(rawValue: UInt32)`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionfunction/init(rawvalue:))[`var BNNSLossReductionMean: BNNSLossReductionFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionmean)Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the number of samples.[`var BNNSLossReductionNonZeroWeightMean: BNNSLossReductionFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionnonzeroweightmean)Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the number of non-zero weights.[`var BNNSLossReductionSum: BNNSLossReductionFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionsum)Sums the loss of all samples in the batch.[`var BNNSLossReductionWeightedMean: BNNSLossReductionFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionweightedmean)Sums the loss of all samples in the batch and divides by the sum of all weights.[`var BNNSLossReductionNone: BNNSLossReductionFunction`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnslossreductionnone)Returns the loss without any reduction.
